segments.text: Hi , I need to make an appointment to see the doctor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a rash that I need a doctor to look at .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a fever with that rash ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it just itches a lot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have openings on Tuesday or Wednesday . Which would be best for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need an appointment on Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , I am putting you down for 9
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to see Dr . Jones .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can schedule you with him with no problem . We look forward to seeing you .
segments.speaker: S2
